name: toonix
label: Toonix
description: Toonix is a set of custom C++ ICE Nodes to generate Toon Lines, it supports Silhouette Detection, Boundary Detection,Intersection Detection(WIP) Crease Detection, Edge Cluster Detection, as well as experimental light and shadow approximation. It outputs on-the-fly polymesh geometry.

name: voronoi
label: Voronoi
description: Voronoi is a softimage C++ plugin to shatter 3D objects

name: usd_read
label: Usd Read
description: UsdRead is a softimage C++ plugin to read usd file and display it in the viewport inside a custom primitive

name: usd_write
label: Usd Write
description: A softimage C++ plugin to export the current softimage scene to the usd file format
